forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 18C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 64F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 18C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 62F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 18C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 62F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low around 10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 50F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 17C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 62F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 57F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Periods of rain early. High 63F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime after midnight. Low 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early with showers developing late. Low 53F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 53F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 62F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
